remarks: Closure of a finite group sum over a finite set of sequential integers as map.  (Contributed by AV, 14-Dec-2018.)
statement:
gsummptfzcl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
gsummptfzcl.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. Mnd ) $.
gsummptfzcl.n $e |- ( ph -> N e. ( ZZ>= ` M ) ) $.
gsummptfzcl.i $e |- ( ph -> I = ( M ... N ) ) $.
gsummptfzcl.e $e |- ( ph -> A. i e. I X e. B ) $.
gsummptfzcl $p |- ( ph -> ( G gsum ( i e. I |-> X ) ) e. B ) $.
$d B i $.
$d I i $.
